column4: hey, i have a question regarding hooking my laptop up to my TV set
i assume i can use similar applications for my crunchbang laptop as my ubuntu one
anyone know how hot get my laptop display to show up on my TV?
i've got it connected with a monitor cable
i'm not familiar with the term fn key.  i'm pretty new to linux in general
tv monitors often can't do very high resolution, so set the output to something low
there's a key on your laptop in another color, Fn or so? bottom left?
the Fn key is like shift or ctrl or alt
it's dead, pressed alonely. but combined with the right other key, it's very powerful
check the color of the fn letters on the key
then look for this color on other keys
it should look like a screen symbol, that which will switch outputs
it's very cool that you know the Fn key
